author: farhan
title: HOWARD SHAW CHARGED WITH DRINK DRIVING AGAIN. RICH MEN NEVER LEARN
text:
HOWARD SHAW CHARGED WITH DRINK DRIVING AGAIN. RICH MEN NEVER LEARN   
Dear A.S.S. Editor Advertisement 
Howard Shaw is back in the courts for yet another drink driving offence! This is going to be the third time that he is charged in court for drink driving offences. He already has two previous convictions, according to court documents, once on Feb 19, 1997 and another on Jan 26, 2006. 
If after three times and you are still caught driving while drunk, then there is something seriously wrong with him. He is not only being a danger to himself, but to other road users too. Hope this rich man will finally learn his lesson. Meantime, he should not be allowed to be driving on the roads. 
Colin H 
A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
